amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment SA 615 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 615 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 56. Record Vote Number: 168.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 615.
Amendment SA 615 proposed by Senator Dayton. (consideration: CR S6430-6431) In the nature of a substitute.

Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 615 proposed by Senator Dayton.
